reviewText: Great documentary. Fabulous photos and videos of Norumbega Park, 1897-1963. Very enjoyable to watch.
Great dvd. I purchased it for my mom because she used to go the the Totem Pole ballroom. she loved it!

I bought it because I lived during the time of Norumbrga.  It brought back many fond memories of my evenings at the Ballroom
with the Big Bands and the enjoyable outings to the Park.  I have passed it around to my many friends who remember those
days , and they have loved it too.

For anyone who ever frequented the famous Norumbega Park, this video is a MUST HAVE. It's historic in its content with beautifully captured photos and films from early days right up until it closed in the 60s. If you ever rode the Merry-Go-Round, paddled a canoe on The Charles or danced to the music of the big bands at the Totem Pole, it's a trip down memory lane that's a positive treasure.
